pages.text:
Hanging herbs are a way to store and process your collected Herbs.   \
	\
	After placing them it will take a short amount of time until they are fully dried and turn into Dried Herbs. You are also able to prevent them from drying by right-clicking them with a honey comb. This will turn them into Waxed Hanging Herbs. As a bonus you are also able to stack multiple of them in a single block.
pages.title: Hanging Herbs

pages.text: After they are dried, they can be processed into chopped herbs on the Herbalist Bench.
